content: Generally it's the first time you form any sort of self-concept or idea of "Me" so it's likely around the time you first learn the word "Me" as a baby or create any sort of object you identify as "Me" in thought. Not sure exactly when, but it is thematically like "when does a kid learn religion?" it is incremental, but it starts whenever they create the belief and it snowballs from there with occasional large or small changes. Your ego/self-image is just "what I think I am" so whenever you first invent that is when it starts. Basically it occurs in the same way a belief in Santa occurs, it's just that most people never question or are lead to question that the way they formulate a self-concept might not be correct.
